overview.summary: Collects information relevant to a error returned by Firebird. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.para: This class is instantiated by the Firebird .NET Data Provider when an error occurs. An instance of FbError is created and managed by the class.

property.name: Class
property.summary: Gets the severity level of the error returned from Firebird.
property.value: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error. The default is 0.

property.name: LineNumber
property.summary: Gets the line number within the DSQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.
property.value: The line number within the DSQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.
property.remarks: Line numbering starts at 1. If the value is 0, the line number is not applicable.

property.name: Message
property.summary: Gets the text describing the error.

property.name: Number
property.summary: Gets a number that identifies the type of error.
